title: Define Quantum Communication Protocol
description: Research and define a quantum communication protocol for the node to ensure secure and instantaneous communication. This will involve studying existing quantum communication protocols, such as Quantum Key Distribution (QKD), and determining how they can be optimized or adapted for our specific use case. Additionally, investigate potential novel approaches to improve efficiency and security of the protocol.

title: Design Quantum Key Distribution System
description: Design a quantum key distribution system to enable secure communication between nodes.

title: Implement Quantum Key Distribution System
description: Develop the quantum key distribution system based on the design.

title: Develop Massive Data Transfer Mechanism
description: Create a mechanism for massive data transfer across the quantum network.

title: Implement Massive Data Transfer Mechanism
description: Code the massive data transfer mechanism based on the design.

title: Design User Interface for Quantum Internet Node
description: Create a user-friendly interface for managing the quantum internet node.

title: Implement User Interface for Quantum Internet Node
description: Develop the user interface based on the design.

title: Test Quantum Internet Node Functionality
description: Conduct thorough testing of the quantum internet node to ensure proper functionality.
dependencies: Implement User Interface for Quantum Internet Node

title: Secure Quantum Internet Node
description: Ensure the quantum internet node is secure from potential threats.

title: Document Quantum Internet Node
description: Write comprehensive documentation for the quantum internet node, detailing its functionalities, setup instructions, troubleshooting guides, and security measures. This documentation will serve as a guide for users and technical staff to effectively utilize and maintain the system.
dependencies: Implement User Interface for Quantum Internet Node
